project.name: configuration generator
project.description:
This file creates a custom configuration for JVoiceXml.
It creates a run.xml ANT build file with the configured components and adapts the configuration files to match the configured components.
To override the current settings follow the instructions given in personal-props/README.txt

target.name: createDistributionConfiguration
target.echo: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <platforms> <platform name="org.jvoicexml.implementation.jsapi10"> <property name="jvxml.jsapi10.talkingJava" value ="true" /> <property name="jvxml.jsapi10.talkingJava.path" value ="../org.jvoicexml.implementation.jsapi10/3rdparty/talkingjava/lib" /> </platform> <platform name="org.jvoicexml.implementation.jsapi20"> <property name="jvxml.jsapi20.sapi" value ="true" /> <property name="jvxml.jsapi20.mac" value ="true" /> </platform> <platform name="org.jvoicexml.implementation.jtapi" /> <platform name="org.jvoicexml.implementation.marc" /> <platform name="org.jvoicexml.implementation.mary" /> <platform name="org.jvoicexml.implementation.mrcpv2" /> <platform name="org.jvoicexml.implementation.red5" /> <platform name="org.jvoicexml.implementation.text" /> <platform name="org.jvoicexml.callmanager.text" /> <platform name="org.jvoicexml.callmanager.sip" /> </platforms>
